Title: Permits union free and central school district boards of education to establish wards for the purpose of school board elections in Orange County
Summary: Authorizes the boards of education in union free school districts and central school districts to establish wards for the purpose of school board elections in Orange County.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the establishment of school election wards in union free school districts and central school districts contained entirely or partially within Orange county
